snippet: The Mets rallied from a 3-0 deficit to take the lead into the ninth, but then the Marlins struck against closer Frank Francisco.
abstract: Miami Marlins defeat New York Mets, 6-5.
lead_paragraph: The Mets rallied from a 3-0 deficit to take the lead into the ninth, but then the Marlins struck against closer Frank Francisco.

headline.seo: Marlins Score Two in Ninth to Beat the Mets
headline.main: Scoring Two Against Francisco, Marlins One-Up the Mets’ Comeback
headline.print_headline: Scoring Two Against Francisco, Marlins One-Up the Mets’ Comeback
